pageProduct.name: Swisse Skincare Blood Orange Brightening Cream Moisturiser 50ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

With Niacinamide, Grape Seed Oil and Squalene

SWISSE BLOOD ORANGE BRIGHTENING
CREAM MOISTURISER delivers a boost of hydration
and radiance to dull, lacklustre skin. Enhanced with
Niacinamide it targets dark spots and helps to improve
the appearance of uneven skin tone and texture.
Skin appears luminous and bright.

Size: 50mL

Warnings

May contain allergens from essential oils.Test prior to use. In the unlikely event of a negative reaction, consult your medical practitioner.

Ingredients

Aqua,
Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil
Cetearyl Alcohol
Glycerin (Plant Derived)
Cetearyl Glucoside (Plant Derived)
Squalane (Plant Derived)
Niacinamide (Vitamin B3)
Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate
Citrus Sinensis (Orange) Fruit Extract
Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract
Capparis Spinosa (Caper) Bud Extract
Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract
Lactobacillus / Papaya Fruit Ferment Extract
Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Liquorice) Root Extract
Arctostaphylos Uva-Ursi (Bearberry) Leaf Extract
Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil
Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil
Michelia Alba (Magnolia) Flower Oil
Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil
Maltodextrin (Plant Derived)
Sodium Citrate (Corn)
Citric Acid (Corn)
Benzyl Alcohol
Dehydroacetic Acid

Directions

After cleansing, apply liberally to face and neck.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 28°C.
